About the Company: Mahadushi International Trade Limited offers services in import/export, agents, contractors, distributes, buyers, and sellers of various types of jewelry. The Company also offers their services for buyers and sellers of precious stone or metal, ornaments, handicrafts, antiques, manuscripts, paintings, readymade garments, textiles, and materials.
